Posts.Content: i had a breast biopsy a year ago and  the result from the pathologist diagnosed the lump as non malignancy and that fibrioadenoma.i had a mamogram in april and went back to the doc for a scan cos i was having pain in the breast and the scan result was also normal.even though i dnt feel pain on regular basis but only during my menses i'm concern about the way my nipple sometimes changes,sometimes both nipples becomes erect and later change.i had the excision in m right breast
Posts.Title: breast excision
